title: Renovation Realities: Dale Jr. & Amy
overview: NASCAR champion Dale Earnhardt Jr. and his wife, Amy, set out to transform a 150-year-old Key West, FL, home into the coastal retreat of their dreams. Despite Dale's eagerness to pitch in and Amy's interior design expertise, they take on the myriad of issues that come with restoring an old home. They also face the risks of renovating on an island, like finding scorpions, getting supplies delivered and hurricane season.
